<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_app_eng_studio_taxonomy</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Scrub creator and editor URLs</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
// Verify that neither the creator or editor URLs contain any new lines.
var creatorUrl = current.creator_url; var editorUrl = current.editor_url;
if (!gs.nil(creatorUrl)) current.creator_url = stripNewLineChars(creatorUrl);
if (!gs.nil(editorUrl)) current.editor_url = stripNewLineChars(editorUrl);
function stripNewLineChars(rawUrl) { var newLineExpr = /\r?\n|\r/g; return rawUrl.replace(newLineExpr, ""); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-10-04 20:00:08</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>16be11e50f1000104c885019c4767e4c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Scrub creator and editor URLs</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="App Engine Studio" source="sn_app_eng_studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="App Engine Studio">e046257545b47c84712b8779a9abd0cb</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_16be11e50f1000104c885019c4767e4c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-10-04 20:13:15</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=16be11e50f1000104c885019c4767e4c"/> </record_update>
